name: Ndizz
content:
Ndizz was a male Kubaz and a member of the Trade Spine League. Despite his unquivering loyalty to the League, he had tried to overthrow its leadership twice by the time of the Iron Blockade.
In the 2015 iOS video game Star Wars: Uprising, Ndizz is one of the many crew members that can be sent on Crew Runs for helpful items.
